content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Operation at (-15,0)
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0) extracting coal
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) storing coal (249 units)

###Iron Mining Operation at (-14,23)
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) storing iron ore (202 units)

###Copper Mining and Processing Line at (20,20)
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) storing copper ore (252 units)
- Additional storage chest at (22.5, 21.5) with copper ore (393 units)
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing copper plates (53 units)
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 22.5) moving ore from input chest to furnace

###Inactive Furnace Group at (-10,20)
- Stone furnace at (-11.0, 20.0) currently idle
- Stone furnace at (-9.0, 20.0) currently idle

ERROR TIPS

###Furnace Fuel Management Issues
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more fuel
- The furnace at (24.0, 20.0) has reached maximum fuel capacity (50/50)

###Inserter Positioning and Configuration
- When setting up inserter-based automation, verify both pickup and drop positions align with source and target inventories
- Multiple attempts were made to reposition inserters - ensure proper placement and orientation first time
- Consider the direction of inserters relative to the containers they interact with

###Resource Flow Issues
- Despite having resources in input storage (393 copper ore), the furnace shows NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Verify the complete path from input storage to furnace is properly connected and oriented
